main.bio: Support and operation of productive environments with high availability of applications focused on Middleware (Oracle, Apache, ATG, etc.) and ETL (Talend and Broker). Development and execution of scripts for improvements and agility in operating processes based on Shell Script. Creation of task automation scripts in Rundeck and Jenkins.

work.title: Junior Infrastructure and Middleware Analyst
work.description: Acting with Middleware, Linux, Talend and Broker, incident resolution in Linux and Windows environments, tracking / executing night releases in Production and Homologation, creation of task automation scripts in Rundeck and Shell Script.

work.title: NOC Support Analyst
work.description: Monitoring of processes and services in production and approval environments with the NOC tools (Zabbix, Site24x7 and DataDog). First level of incident handling in Linux and Windows environments. Monitoring of night releases in Production and Approval environments.

work.title: IT support technician
work.description: Support for Windows Server and Linux servers. Support LAN, WAN and WLAN networks. Assembly, maintenance, installation and support for computers, servers and computer systems.
